snippet: In what may have been a retaliation for the kidnapping and killing of three Israeli teenagers who were buried a day earlier, a Palestinian youth was forced into a car and killed.
abstract: Abduction and killing of Muhammad Abu Khdeir, Palestinian teenager whose burned body was found in a Jerusalem forest, further poisons relations between Israelis and Palestinians and prompts international outrage; boy's death is alleged to be reprisal for kidnapping and killing of three Israeli teenagers.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren and Said Ghazali contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Robert Mackey from New York.

lead_paragraph: In what may have been a retaliation for the kidnapping and killing of three Israeli teenagers who were buried a day earlier, a Palestinian youth was forced into a car and killed.

headline.main: Arab Boy’s Death Escalates Clash Over Abductions
headline.print_headline: Arab Boy’s Death Escalates Clash Over Abductions
